title: Age of Mythology -  Extended Edition version 1.9 repack Mr DJ

 The classic real time strategy game that transports players to a time when

 affairs of mortals. Use mythological creatures like Minotaurs and Cyclopes
 to bolster your armies' strength. Call upon the gods for assistance in
 flattening enemy towns with meteors or scatter opposing troops with
 lightning storms

 The Extended Edition includes:

 * Age of Mythology
 * Age of Mythology: The Titans
 * Golden Gift Campaign

 New in the Extended Edition:

 * Time of Day
 * Improved water
 * Shadows
 * Bump / Specular maps
 * Global Lighting

**INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

After running setup,, select the necessary software (direct x and visual c++ provided in Redist folder),, install as usual,, play the game from desktop shortcut using run as administrator....
